data.text:
@gillianoberholzer, @shaunviljoen @jakovanrensburg

We were not aware that you guys use the Search Screens for reporting purposes. We Limit the records as we feel fit for performance of the feature. Our change should not affect support as the feature was not created for reporting.

We will create the Request in the correct system - "Report Central".
Gillian - Please amend the log accordingly.
